roleset.name: 'hit me up'; get ahold of me, possibly with a request
roleset.note: HMU-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from hmu.01-v)

example.name: arg0
example.text: Yo i m down here just chillin . Just *PRO* hmu when u headin to the sub i can meet u there
example.arg: when u headin to the sub
